latest-headlines.headline: ‘Empuraan’ movie producers make 24 cuts, drop ‘Baba Bajrangi’ name
latest-headlines.summary: ‘Empuraan’ movie producers make 24 cuts, drop ‘Baba Bajrangi’ name. The producers of controversial Malayalam move, L2: Empuraan, mired in controversy for its depiction of right-wing politics and covert references to the 2002 Gujarat riots, made 24 cuts including changing name of the main antagonist from Baba Bajrangi to Baldev, people aware of the details said on Tuesday  Antony Perumbavoor, one of the two producers of the film, said that it was a collective decision of the film’s makers to go ahead with making cuts in order to avoid hurting the emotions of a section of people  (HT photo) The re-edited version will be released in cinemas on Wednesday to replace the earlier version released on March 27

latest-headlines.headline: New waqf bill incorporates all 25 changes suggested by JPC
latest-headlines.summary: New waqf bill incorporates all 25 changes suggested by JPC. The National Democratic Alliance’s Waqf (Amendment) Bill makes fundamental changes in the central law that governs the Islamic charitable endowments, create a new set of framework that allows non-Muslims to be a part of waqf bodies, and authorises government officials to conduct surveys of waqf properties  Chairman of JPC on Waqf (Amendment) Bill BJP MP Jagdambika Pal submits the final report on Waqf (Amendment) Bill to Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla, at Parliament in New Delhi on January 30 (ANI) The new draft of the waqf bill, made public on Tuesday and to be taken up in the Lok Sabha on Wednesday, incorporates 25 recommendations made by the joint parliamentary committee (JPC)  The Union government argues that the proposed law will address issues and challenges in regulating and managing waqf properties but the Opposition alleges it will impinge on constitutional rights

latest-headlines.headline: Parliament face-off likely as LS takes up Waqf bill
latest-headlines.summary: Parliament face-off likely as LS takes up Waqf bill. New Delhi: The Lok Sabha will take up the contentious Waqf amendment bill for discussion and passage on Wednesday, setting the stage for confrontation in Parliament on what is among the National Democratic Alliance (NDA) government’s flagship initiatives in its third term  In this image posted by @ombirlakota via X on Jan  30, 2025, Members of the Joint Parliamentary Committee on Waqf Amendment Bill headed by its Chairman Jagdambika Pal during the submission of its report to Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla, at the Parliament House, in New Delhi

latest-headlines.headline: ALH to be grounded for 3 more months
latest-headlines.summary: ALH to be grounded for 3 more months. The military’s Dhruv advanced light helicopter (ALH) fleet, which was grounded nearly three months ago following a fatal crash in Gujarat, will stay out of action for at least three more months with investigators struggling to determine the root cause of the accident in which two Indian Coast Guard pilots and an aircrew diver were killed, officials aware of the matter said on Tuesday  The prolonged grounding of the workhorse fleet is a setback for the three services and the coast guard who together operate around 330 ALHs  (HT File) Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL), which has designed and developed the ALH, has broadened the scope of the ongoing investigation by involving Bengaluru-based Indian Institute of Science (IISc) to perform fatigue testing of a critical part in the twin-engine helicopter’s transmission system to get to the bottom of the matter, the officials said, asking not to be named

latest-headlines.headline: No SC relief for Allahbadia on petition to travel
latest-headlines.summary: No SC relief for Allahbadia on petition to travel. The Supreme Court on Tuesday refused to grant immediate relief to podcaster and YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia in his plea for the release of his passport and permission to travel abroad, stating that his request will only be considered after the investigation into cases linked to his obscene and distasteful remarks on a show is completed  The Supreme Court on Tuesday refused to grant immediate relief to podcaster and YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia in his plea for the release of his passport and permission to travel abroad(PTI) The court’s decision came just weeks after it allowed Allahbadia, known as BeerBiceps on social media, to resume his podcast, “The Ranveer Show”, albeit with an undertaking that he would maintain “standards of decency and morality”  On Tuesday, when the YouTuber expressed concerns over the impact of travel restrictions on his livelihood, a bench led by justice Surya Kant was firm that his movements could not be unrestricted while the probe was still underway

latest-headlines.headline: India weighs options ahead of Trump’s tariff action today
latest-headlines.summary: India weighs options ahead of Trump’s tariff action today. India is adopting a wait-and-see approach to US President Donald Trump’s impending “reciprocal tariffs” announcement on Wednesday, choosing to evaluate the actual impact before formulating its response—a measured stance compared to the more reactive approaches of other major economies  India weighs options ahead of Trump’s tariff action today(Bloomberg) Follow LIVE updates here The preparations come ahead of Trump’s April 2 “Liberation Day” tariffs that are expected to be announced at 4pm local time on Wednesday (early Thursday in India )  The Republican leader on Monday said India will be among the countries that drop tariffs in response to his move

latest-headlines.headline: New Delhi, Beijing working on plan to stabilise bilateral ties
latest-headlines.summary: New Delhi, Beijing working on plan to stabilise bilateral ties. India and China have resolved several issues in their border areas and are working on a road map to put bilateral ties on a “stable, predictable and amicable path”, foreign secretary Vikram Misri said on Tuesday at an event organised by the Chinese embassy to mark the 75th anniversary of diplomatic relations  Misri described the 75th anniversary of diplomatic ties as an opportunity to rebuild India-China ties(HT_PRINT) Also Read: Xi Jinping’s ‘Dragon-Elephant tango’ message to President Murmu on India-China relations Misri’s presence at the reception hosted by Chinese ambassador Xu Feihong marked a significant turnaround from India’s practice of deputing a junior diplomat to events organised by the Chinese embassy during the more than four-year military standoff on the Line of Actual Control (LAC), or even skipping certain events  With the two sides reaching an understanding last October on withdrawing troops from the “friction points” at Demchok and Depsang and holding a series of meetings to normalise relations, Misri and Xu also participated in a toast to bilateral ties and cut a ceremonial cake

latest-headlines.headline: Key BJP allies set to vote in favour of waqf bill
latest-headlines.summary: Key BJP allies set to vote in favour of waqf bill. The Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) is confident of the support of key allies such as the Janata Dal (United), the Lok Janshakti Party (Ram Vilas) and the Telugu Desam Party (TDP), whose backing is crucial for the controversial Waqf (Amendment) Bill to clear Parliament, senior leaders said on Tuesday  Chairman of JPC on Waqf (Amendment) Bill, 2024, BJP MP Jagdambika Pal submitted the final report on Waqf (Amendment) Bill to Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla(ANI) Also Read: Waqf Bill in Lok Sabha today; INDIA bloc holds strategy meet, BJP issues whip The BJP has issued a whip to its members to be present in the Lok Sabha when it is taken up for discussion at noon on Wednesday  The JD(U) has also issued a whip to its members to remain present in the House and has clarified that it supports the bill, which seeks to bring sweeping changes to how waqf properties are regulated

latest-headlines.headline: Conversion to Islam 'bona fide' if done by 'free will, with sound mind': HC
latest-headlines.summary: Conversion to Islam 'bona fide' if done by 'free will, with sound mind': HC. The Allahabad high court has observed that the conversion of a person to Islam can be deemed bona fide if he/she is an adult, is of sound mind and has embraced the religion because of his/her belief in the oneness of God  The court also said a person's faith in the prophetic character of Mohammed is also a prerequisite for conversion  The court also dismissed the petitioner's contention that the two sides reached a compromise in the 2021 rape case

latest-headlines.headline: Waqf Bill in Lok Sabha today; INDIA bloc holds strategy meet, BJP issues whip
latest-headlines.summary: Waqf Bill in Lok Sabha today; INDIA bloc holds strategy meet, BJP issues whip. The Lok Sabha will take up the contentious Waqf (Amendment) Bill for discussion and passage on Wednesday, setting the stage for a showdown between the Narendra Modi-led government and the Opposition's India bloc Earlier today, minorities and parliamentary affairs minister Kiren Rijiju told reporters that the Lok Sabha's business advisory committee (BAC), which includes leaders from all major parties and is chaired by Speaker Om Birla, agreed on an eight-hour debate  INDIA bloc leaders during a meeting at Parliament House in New Delhi

latest-headlines.headline: Pakistan cricket team slapped with fine vs New Zealand - Here's why
latest-headlines.summary: Pakistan cricket team slapped with fine vs New Zealand - Here's why. Pakistan have been fined 10 percent of their match fee for a slow over-rate in the first ODI against New Zealand, as they fell two overs short  Mark Chapman's 132 and Daryl Mitchell's 76 helped New Zealand post 344, which was enough for a 73-run victory as Pakistan collapsed from 249/3 to 271 all out

latest-headlines.headline: Sunil Gavaskar trolls Rishabh Pant with 'stupid, stupid, stupid' remark on live TV
latest-headlines.summary: Sunil Gavaskar trolls Rishabh Pant with 'stupid, stupid, stupid' remark on live TV. Sunil Gavaskar revived the 'Stupid, stupid, stupid' comment in response to a question about Lucknow Super Giants' batting strategy  He suggested that the absence of key bowlers might be influencing their aggressive approach, necessity to compensate for their bowling weakness  Lucknow Super Giants are currently missing key players, with Mohsin Khan ruled out of the tournament and speedster Mayank Yadav also unavailable

latest-headlines.headline: 'Not joking': Why Donald Trump is repeatedly talking about a third term
latest-headlines.summary: 'Not joking': Why Donald Trump is repeatedly talking about a third term. US President Donald Trump has hinted at serving a third term, despite the 22nd Amendment prohibiting it  Legal scholars and democracy advocates are concerned, as this echoes tactics used by authoritarian leaders  Trump's fascination with strongmen and frequent provocations suggest a serious intent, challenging democratic norms and drawing significant attention

latest-headlines.summary: IPL 2025 crorepatis who have been a royal disappointment. Several high-profile players, including Rishabh Pant and Rohit Sharma, are underperforming in the IPL 2025 season  Despite their hefty price tags and previous successes, they have struggled to make significant contributions in their respective matches, raising concerns for their franchises  ​This season's IPL is no exception, with a few big names making it to that unwanted list

latest-headlines.summary: $1.4 trillion trade war: How Trump tariffs could hit the world, may lift India slightly. President Trump plans to announce 'Liberation Day,' imposing 25% tariffs intended to boost US revenue by $6 trillion over a decade but risking global economic instability  Economists predict a $1 4 trillion global income hit, inflation, and disrupted trade

latest-headlines.headline: This is how a Pennsylvania family found a Kennedy half dollar worth $50,000
latest-headlines.summary: This is how a Pennsylvania family found a Kennedy half dollar worth $50,000. A family in Pennsylvania found a rare 1964 Kennedy half dollar worth more than $50,000 while sorting through their grandfather's vintage items  The coin is valuable due to its minting error called double die obverse, its historical significance, and its pristine condition  Coin collectors should pay attention to mint marks, dates, and errors to identify valuable coins

latest-headlines.summary: IPL 2025: Punjab Kings captain Shreyas Iyer hands debut cap to 157.3 kmph star vs Lucknow Super Giants. Punjab Kings captain Shreyas Iyer chose to field after winning the toss against Lucknow Super Giants in Lucknow  Fast bowler Lockie Ferguson made his debut for Punjab Kings  Rishabh Pant retained the same XI from their previous match

latest-headlines.headline: Vitamin D patches: Are they more effective than pills?
latest-headlines.summary: Vitamin D patches: Are they more effective than pills?. Vitamin D, essential for bone health and immune function, can be supplemented through pills or transdermal patches  Patches suit individuals with digestive issues, offering gradual, steady release, bypassing the gut  Pills offer various dosages and additional nutrients but may cause stomach problems

latest-headlines.headline: Lifestyle modifications to manage osteoporosis
latest-headlines.summary: Lifestyle modifications to manage osteoporosis. Osteoporosis, a condition that weakens bones, can be managed with lifestyle changes  Adequate calcium, vitamin D, weight-bearing exercises, and avoiding negative habits like smoking and excessive alcohol are crucial  Preventing falls and adhering to medication can reduce fracture risk

latest-headlines.headline: EPFO to increase auto settlement limit to 5 lakhs for PF claims and allow UPI withdrawals
latest-headlines.summary: EPFO to increase auto settlement limit to 5 lakhs for PF claims and allow UPI withdrawals. The Employees Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) has raised the auto-settlement of advance claims limit to Rs 5 lakh from Rs 1 lakh, enhancing ease of living for 7 5 crore members  The move, approved during the 113th CBT meeting, will streamline claim settlements
